content: Well said, I think it might be the ‘last’ trend before something really different will come forward.. what I mean is — we’re just upon the edge of something new — like the day before everybody started to use the flat UI, the bold headers, the white big spaces… we’ve seen it all — and gradient is the last thing to change something from flat white UI to a bit more interesting (and prettier perhaps, yes) though.. what will be the ‘next’ thing?… I’m wondering because we had it all. Thanks for the article! :)
